name: Stick Your Neck Out
description:
Save the future of Mankind with the Irrefutable power of Giraffes!

Match-make between pairs and and with each generation improve traits to out-wit; out muscle and out neck that nasty meteor!

This game is a freeware game for Ludum Dare 46; and is probably not ready for gameplay yet; but it was a lot of fun to make. Thank you!
